srs.title: SRS Learning
srs.description: Set the number of new cards added per session in SRS (spaced repetition) mode

answerMode.title: Answer Mode
answerMode.description: Set how you choose answers during study
answerMode.swipeAutoNote:
Swipe directions are set automatically based on study mode.
• SRS: ← Again / → Good
• Other modes: ← Unknown / → Known
